Classes.Balls

Class NumberedBall

  • java.lang.Object
    • Classes.Ball
      • Classes.Balls.NumberedBall

  • public class NumberedBall
extends Ball
    The NumberedBall class represents a billiard ball with a number.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Lennart B
